pr_title: [miio] add support for huayi Fans, heater and lights

timeline.message:
[miio] add support for huayi Fans, heater and lights

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
